docs.snippet: Indiana stayed alive by winning Game 5 of the Eastern Conference finals as Miami’s LeBron James was limited to 7 points....
docs.lead_paragraph: Indiana stayed alive by winning Game 5 of the Eastern Conference finals as Miami’s LeBron James was limited to 7 points.
docs.abstract: Miami Heat forward LeBron James is plagued by foul trouble in Game 5 of Eastern Conference finals against Indiana Pacers, playing just 24 minutes and scoring a playoff career-low of 7 points.

headline.main: Pacers’ Stephenson Gets in James’s Ear, but Not in His Head
headline.print_headline: After Strange Loss, New Resolve for Heat

docs.snippet: San Antonio regrouped from two convincing defeats to take a 3-2 series lead against the Oklahoma City Thunder in the Western Conference finals....
docs.lead_paragraph: San Antonio regrouped from two convincing defeats to take a 3-2 series lead against the Oklahoma City Thunder in the Western Conference finals.
docs.abstract: San Antonio Spurs defeat Oklahoma City Thunder, 117-89, to lead Western Conference finals, 3-2.

headline.main: Spurs Take Another Step Toward Redemption

docs.snippet: Rochelle Sterling agreed Thursday night to sell the Los Angeles Clippers to Steve Ballmer, the former chief executive of Microsoft, for $2 billion, which would be the largest price ever for an N.B.A. franchise....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rochelle Sterling agreed Thursday night to sell the Los Angeles Clippers to Steve Ballmer, the former chief executive of Microsoft, for $2 billion, which would be the largest price ever for an N.B.A. franchise.
docs.abstract: Former Microsoft chief executive Steve Ballmer agrees to pay $2 billion for Los Angeles Clippers; Rochelle Sterling, Donald Sterling's wife and co-owner of team, signs deal, which would be largest price ever for a National Basketball Association franchise; sale ends troubling situation for league.

headline.main: Steve Ballmer Said to Sign $2 Billion Deal to Buy Clippers
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Mogul Said to Sign $2 Billion Deal to Buy Clippers
